title: These 28 On-Sale Nordstrom Shoes Are the Key to Exuding South of France Wealth This Summer
author: Ana Escalante
excerpt: From strappy sandals to classic designer pairs, these shoes from the Nordstrom Half-Yearly Sale give major rich-girl energy.
text: If you've ever dreamed of capturing that effortlessly chic, quietly luxurious style that French women seem to master from birth—think breezy linen, buttery leather, and sandals that whisper "I summer in Saint-Tropez"—then this is your moment. The Nordstrom Half-Yearly Sale is on through June 1, and we've rounded up 28 pairs of stunning, on-sale shoes that are basically your one-way ticket to looking South of France–level wealthy without blowing your entire summer budget.From minimalist slides perfect for a seaside stroll to strappy heels that channel Cannes red carpet energy, these picks whisper wealth. With deals coming in at up to 60% off, it's the kind of wardrobe upgrade French women would totally approve of—practical, polished, and always pulled-together.Ready to shop like you're sipping rosé on a yacht? Scroll on, and snag your favorites before they're gone. After all, chic waits for no one.Best Designer Shoes From the Nordstrom Half-Yearly SaleFrom The Row to Chloé, designer shoes are rampant on the Nordstrom Half-Yearly Sale shoe page. Most are ringing in under $1000, which is practically a steal when you look at their original price tags. The Row T-Strap Mary Jane Flat Chloé Polly Double Strap Slide Sandal Manolo Blahnik Callamu Kitten Heel Slide Sandal Tory Burch Cap Toe Slingback Pump Best Sandals From the Nordstrom Half-Yearly SaleFrom beach club–ready slides to strappy styles to go to brunch in, these expensive-looking sandal deals from the Nordstrom Half-Yearly Sale are nothing to scoff at. Brands such as Steve Madden, Rothy's, and Vince are joining in on the deals. The heels from the Nordstrom Half-Yearly Sale are living in my mind rent-free. Trending styles like suede sandals and classic '90s-inspired mules are selling out fast due to their deep discounts. I'd run, not walk, to snag a pair. From rising favorites like the Sam Edelman Michaela Mary Janes in butter yellow to ritzy European-esque espadrilles, these deals are ones you don't want to miss. html:
If you've ever dreamed of capturing that effortlessly chic, quietly luxurious style that French women seem to master from birth—think breezy linen, buttery leather, and sandals that whisper "I summer in Saint-Tropez"—then this is your moment. The Nordstrom Half-Yearly Sale is on through June 1, and we've rounded up 28 pairs of stunning, on-sale shoes that are basically your one-way ticket to looking South of France–level wealthy without blowing your entire summer budget.

From minimalist slides perfect for a seaside stroll to strappy heels that channel Cannes red carpet energy, these picks whisper wealth. With deals coming in at up to 60% off, it's the kind of wardrobe upgrade French women would totally approve of—practical, polished, and always pulled-together.

Ready to shop like you're sipping rosé on a yacht? Scroll on, and snag your favorites before they're gone. After all, chic waits for no one.

Best Designer Shoes From the Nordstrom Half-Yearly Sale

From The Row to Chloé, designer shoes are rampant on the Nordstrom Half-Yearly Sale shoe page. Most are ringing in under $1000, which is practically a steal when you look at their original price tags.

The Row

T-Strap Mary Jane Flat

Chloé

Polly Double Strap Slide Sandal

Manolo Blahnik

Callamu Kitten Heel Slide Sandal

Tory Burch

Cap Toe Slingback Pump

Best Sandals From the Nordstrom Half-Yearly Sale

From beach club–ready slides to strappy styles to go to brunch in, these expensive-looking sandal deals from the Nordstrom Half-Yearly Sale are nothing to scoff at. Brands such as Steve Madden, Rothy's, and Vince are joining in on the deals.

Rothy's

The Weekend Slide

Best Heels From the Nordstrom Half-Yearly Sale

Getting ready for a fancy dinner alfresco this summer? The heels from the Nordstrom Half-Yearly Sale are living in my mind rent-free. Trending styles like suede sandals and classic '90s-inspired mules are selling out fast due to their deep discounts. I'd run, not walk, to snag a pair.

Nordstrom

Sydney Ankle Strap Sandal

Steve Madden

Cary Heeled Sandal

Steve Madden

Patsy Slide Sandal

Dolce Vita

Fabola Slide Sandal

Best Ballet Flats From the Nordstrom Half-Yearly Sale

Ballet flats are such a staple among French women, so it's no surprise to see them land on a list of South of France must-haves. From rising favorites like the Sam Edelman Michaela Mary Janes in butter yellow to ritzy European-esque espadrilles, these deals are ones you don't want to miss.

Sam Edelman

Schutz

Mansur Gavriel

Square Toe Ballet Flat

Best Flat Shoes From the Nordstrom Half-Yearly Sale

Loafers! Boat shoes! Slip-ons! Functionality is peak wealth for the rich folk who use the word "summer" as a verb in the Côte d'Azur. If you're looking for something a bit more runway-forward, there are a few boat-shoe options to choose from, including a pair in a fun, summery shade that's ringing in well under $100.
